very dense, and hard to read. Nevertheless, we might be able to see a familiar autoregression
pattern. We might also see some signiﬁcant lag observations at one year out. Further investigation
may suggest a seasonal autocorrelation component, which would not be a surprising ﬁnding.
Figure 18.1: ACF and PACF plots for the univariate series of power consumption.
We can zoom in the plot and change the number of lag observations from 365 to 50.
